sentences.en: ...the small oval framed picture of a little boy.
sentences.cn: …一个小男孩的镶在椭圆形框架里的小幅照片。

sentences.en: an oval face
sentences.cn: 鹅蛋脸

sentences.en: Congress is waiting to see how the Oval Office will react.
sentences.cn: 国会正观望总统方面的反应。

sentences.en: Go and open the oval box on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 去并打开在沙发上的椭圆形的盒子。

sentences.en: He was a man in his late thirties, with fine, dark hair and a pale oval face.
sentences.cn: 他年近四十，头发乌黑亮泽，长着一张苍白的鹅蛋脸。

sentences.en: Her face was small and oval , and her vivid lips were curved in a persistent smile.
sentences.cn: 一张小圆脸, 那鲜红的嘴唇就是生气的时候也像是在那里笑.

sentences.en: Her oval, olive - skinned face was suffused with anger and her little lips were bloodless.
sentences.cn: 她那俏黑的圆脸上透着怒红,小嘴唇却变白.

sentences.en: Oval dining room table with 6 chairs. Chairs can be repositioned.
sentences.cn: 六椅椭圆形餐桌. 椅子的位置可以改变.

sentences.en: She has a lovely oval face.
sentences.cn: 她长着一张可爱的椭圆脸.

sentences.en: She has an unusually attractive oval face and green eyes set slightly on the slant.
sentences.cn: 她有着一张非常迷人的瓜子脸和一对眼梢儿有点斜的绿眼睛.

sentences.en: She was all ovals -- oval - shaped eyes, the bones of her face, the contour of her brow.
sentences.cn: 她身上的一切都是鸟蛋形的 —— 鸟蛋形的眼睛, 鸟蛋形的脸庞, 鸟蛋形的前额.

sentences.en: Some of them are square, and some maybe oval.
sentences.cn: 有些是方形的，还有些可能是椭圆形的。

sentences.en: That must be the oval unroofed amphitheater in Rome. It was basically a stadium with comprehensive functions.
sentences.cn: 那就是罗马的椭圆型露天竞技场了, 基本上是综合功能的体育场.

sentences.en: The base of scoin is cut diagonally to expose a large oval of cambium.
sentences.cn: 接穗的基部被切成斜形,暴露出椭圆形的大圈形成层.

sentences.en: The clock stands on an oval marble base, enclosed by a glass dome.
sentences.cn: 钟放在椭圆形的大理石基座上，外罩玻璃罩。

sentences.en: The leaf is oval in shape.
sentences.cn: 叶呈椭圆形.

sentences.en: The shape of the earth is an oval.
sentences.cn: 地球的形状是个椭圆形.

sentences.en: They went in the office behind the Oval Office.
sentences.cn: 总统和她进了一间办公室,就在椭圆办公室后面.

sentences.en: Using 2 spoons, form the cheese into small balls or ovals.
sentences.cn: 用两把勺把干酪挤成小圆球状或椭圆球状。

sentences.en: When she smiled, dimples appeared in the firm healthy flesh of her oval - shaped face.
sentences.cn: 瓜子形的脸庞也还丰润,在她带笑说话的时候, 脸颊上现出两个酒窝.

trans.tran_en: Oval things have a shape that is like a circle but is wider in one direction than the other

trans.tran_cn: 椭圆形，椭圆运动场（等），椭圆，美式足球用球，[物]卵形线
trans.tran_en: a shape like a circle, but wider in one direction than the other
a shape like a circle, but wider in one direction than the other
